CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The best PCE value of 6.33% was obtained from the blend device of PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 and [6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) , with a short - circuit current density ( J SC ) higher than 16 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

1. PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25
2. [6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)

Both PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 and PC71BM are material names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25
2. PC71BM

These are the only entities in the paragraph that can be clearly identified as material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The best PCE value of 6.33% was obtained from the blend device of PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 and [6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) , with a short - circuit current density ( J SC ) higher than 16 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

1. "The best PCE value of 6.33%" - Percentage Efficiency (PCE) is a property value.
2. "from the blend device of PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 and [6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)" - The blend device is a compound or material, but the value "6.33%" is the property value of efficiency for that blend device.
3. "higher than 16 mA / cm^2" - Current density (J SC) is a property value.

So, the property values in the paragraph are:
1. PCE = 6.33%
2. J SC > 16 mA / cm^2
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

The paragraph mentions two material properties and their respective values:

1. PCE = 6.33%
2. J SC > 16 mA / cm^2

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to the values of material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE = 6.33% |
| J SC > 16 mA / cm^2 |
